sentences.en: ...refractory priests who refused to side with the king.
sentences.cn: ...拒绝支持国王的桀骜不驯的牧师。

sentences.en: All kinds of firebrick die. Refractory ball mold. Die frame.
sentences.cn: 各种耐火砖模具. 耐火球模具. 模具外框.

sentences.en: Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs ( eg. at a manway ) in refractory linings.
sentences.cn: 必须小心地完全封闭耐火材料衬里的进口门.

sentences.en: Chemical compounds made binary elements are body of refractory materials.
sentences.cn: 由两种元素生成的化合物是耐火材料的主体.

sentences.en: Conclusion Riperidone is effective and safe in the treatment of refractory schizophrenia.
sentences.cn: 结论维思通治疗难治性精神分裂症疗效较好,安全性较大.

sentences.en: Fire classification as a Category II, refractory grade two.
sentences.cn: 防火分类为二类, 耐火等级二级.

sentences.en: Greece has been producing refractory grade chromite ore for more than a hundred years.
sentences.cn: 希腊生产耐火级铬铁矿石已有百余年历史.

sentences.en: Hard alloy, refractory metal, super hard alloy ( diamond ) products, etc.
sentences.cn: 硬质合金 、 熔金属 、 硬合金 ( 刚石 ) 品等.

sentences.en: In severe or refractory cases, cauterization of the individual lesions with nitrate has been used.
sentences.cn: 在严重或顽固性病例中, 个别的可用硝酸盐烧灼.

sentences.en: Objective : To summarize the causes and therapeutic countermeasures of refractory common cold.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的:分析难治性感冒的原因与对策.

sentences.en: Reflux leads to recurrent or refractory aspiration pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 反流可引起复发的难治的吸入性肺炎.

sentences.en: Refractory children , lunatics, and criminals may require authority, and may need to be forced to obey.
sentences.cn: 对倔强的儿童, 精神病人以及犯罪的人,需要使用权力, 或者需要强迫服从.

sentences.en: Silicate Aluminum refractory ( ceramic ) fiber ropes, cloths, strips, packings and sleevings.
sentences.cn: 硅酸铝 ( 陶瓷 ) 耐火纤维编绳 、 布 、 带 、 扭绳、盘根、套管等.

sentences.en: Silicate minerals are characteristically refractory and difficult to break down.
sentences.cn: 硅酸盐矿物的特点是耐熔和难以分离.

sentences.en: Successive bouts of heart failure are apt to become more refractory to treatment.
sentences.cn: 连续发作的心力衰竭可能变得难于治疗.

sentences.en: The study of the nanostructured refractory metals was mentioned.
sentences.cn: 简述了纳米晶难熔金属的研究现状.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 耐火浆料；浇灌耐火材料
耐火衬砌；耐火内衬；耐火材料
耐火材料；耐热材料；难熔物质

trans.tran_cn: 执拗的，倔强的，难治疗的，耐熔的
trans.tran_en: a refractory disease or illness is hard to treat or cure
